review.review_text: Pop corns are invariably associated with movies and munching. But this little outlet in the busy walkway at the first floor of Select City Mall will introduce you to an entire unexplored range of flavoured popcorns. The menu is exquisite and caters to both sweet and spice loving taste buds. The staff is patient and sporty enough to let you taste various flavours before you settle for your pick. After tasting a couple of flavours, we settled for the the Dark Chocolate Overload and Classic Pizza K...

Ordered their popcorn as baby announcement gifts. Got the chocolate, wasabi and caramel flavours! Not only were the guys at Crunchbox extremely responsive and helpful, they delivered 750 tins of popcorn without a single glitch. The popcorn of course is fantastic and there is really no comparison to it (I tried and compared all before picking CrunchBox)! Great stuff. Will surely be a regular customer!

Wasn't sure of the idea of trying out flavoured pop-corns, but regret not trying them out earlier. Had the Dark chocolate & Smokehouse BBQ flavors and simply loved them.  We ended up ordering huge quantities and they had vanished in our stomachs within an hour. Irresistible!!   Its a pocket friendly place, so will be back soon to try the other flavours out, if I am left with space after the ones I tried earlier - especially dark chocolate!!

This is definitely the place to rush to on a day when u crave something satiating - especially on a day when u need to gorge on something sweet.   We tried the smokehouse bbq flavour and the dark chocolate one ... Being a hardcore dark chocolate lover - this place took me by surprise - the dark chocolate popcorns were divine! The smokehouse bbq was also delicious in its own subtle ways.   The pricing is super easy on the pocket and this place is my quick fix from now on on eves when i crave dark...

My favourite spot for the best popcorn in  Delhi. Limited flavours does create a drawback but then each flavour is a packet of 10 other flavours, thus balancing the variety issue. My personal favourite being wasabi and minty indian. I recommend every person setting foot in Delhi to try it at least once.
